title: Alters requirements with respect to transportation of children to nonpublic schools in school districts, applying to all school districts
summary: Requires the superintendent of each school district to prepare a public school calendar and notify the officials of nonpublic schools of such calendar for the purpose of determining the days when the school district is closed, but the nonpublic are open and require the transportation of students.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to transportation services
